parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delay in receiving recall repair parts can lead to safety risks, as the suspension issue can cause loss of control, accidents, or detachment of the rear stabilizer bar.
symptoms: as the complaints are related to the delay in receiving recall repair parts.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the suspension system can cause loss of control, accidents, or detachment of the rear stabilizer bar, leading to safety risks.
symptoms: vehicle swaying from side to side

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the alternator can cause the battery to drain, leading to loss of power, stalling, or stranding, which can be a safety risk.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Loose Front Chassis Frame Crossmember Rivets
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The loose rivets can cause the sector shaft in the steering box to get loose, leading to excessive play and potentially catastrophic failure, resulting in loss of steering functionality and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: loose sector shaft in the steering box
excessive play in the steering system.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The leaking adapter can cause a loss of power steering and power brake functionality, leading to increased stopping distances and reduced vehicle control, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Power steering and power brake failure

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Missing or Worn-Out Sway Bar Attachment Bracket Components
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The missing or worn-out components can cause the sway bar to malfunction, leading to reduced vehicle stability and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Loose or worn-out sway bar attachment brackets

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Premature Failure of Standard Ford Shocks
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The premature failure of the shocks can cause reduced vehicle stability, increased tail swing, and compromised steering, leading to increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: premature failure of standard Ford shocks.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Delayed Response to Rear Axle Safety Recall
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delayed response to the rear axle safety recall can lead to catastrophic failure of the axle bearings, resulting in injury or accidents.
symptoms: The consumer is unable to find a dealer willing to perform the safety recall
the manufacturer does not offer assistance
and the recall repair is delayed
leaving the vehicle in an unsafe condition.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Incorrect Fluid Fill in Rear Axle
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The incorrect fluid fill in the rear axle can cause catastrophic failure of the axle bearings, leading to injury or accidents.
symptoms: The rear axle bearings may fail
